Package com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase

Interface Summary
CompositeDao<K,E,S> The CompositeDao provides an interface for fetching from tables that may have multiple entities stored per row.
DeleteActionModifier Generic callback interface used by HBaseClientTemplate class.
EntityComposer<E> An EntityComposer is an interface that supports entity construction and de-construction methods.
EntityComposer.Builder<E> An interface for entity builders.
EntityMapper<K,E> An interface for mapping HBase Result instances to a Key/Entity pair, and a Key/Entity to an HBase Put instances.
GetModifier Generic callback interface used by HBaseClientTemplate class.
KeyEntitySchemaParser<KEY_SCHEMA extends KeySchema,ENTITY_SCHEMA extends EntitySchema> Interface for the HBase Common Key and Entity parser.
KeySerDe<K> This class handles key serialization and deserialization.
PutActionModifier Generic callback interface used by HBaseClientTemplate class.
ScanModifier Generic callback interface used by HBaseClientTemplate class.
 

Class Summary
BaseDao<K,E> A DAO implementation that uses a constructor provided EntityMapper to do basic conversion between entities and HBase Gets and Puts.
BaseEntityBatch<K,E>  
BaseEntityMapper<K,E> A base implementation of EntityMapper, that uses the provided EntitySerDe and KeyBuilderFactory to map Key/Entity pairs to HBase puts, and HBase results to KeyEntity pairs.
BaseEntityScanner<K,E> Base EntityScanner implementation.
BaseEntityScanner.Builder<K,E> Scanner builder for BaseEntityScanner
CompositeBaseDao<K,E,S> Base implementation of the CompositeDao interface.
DeleteAction Represents a Delete.
EntityScannerBuilder<K,E> An abstract class that EntityScanner implementations should extend to offer a builder interface.
EntitySerDe<E> This class handles entity serialization and deserialization.
HBaseClientTemplate This class simplifies the use of HBase client, and helps to avoid common errors by managing its own cleanup of resources.
HBaseUtils Static utility functions for working with the HBase API.
PutAction Represents an HBase Put.
VersionCheckAction A version check action, which allows us to check that the version of an entity hasn't changed.
